name: Gods Path
description:
Give orders to the creature through the decoder and help it find its way home.

Controls(Keyboard + Mouse)

use the arrow keys to change the tiles of the cipher and move your character towards the exit 

Press Esc to exit the game 

Credits: 

Nicholas Falcone, Programmer.
